author: Mike Masnick
description: The Supreme Court pulled off another shadow docket masterpiece this week, granting Trump’s request to keep FTC Commissioner Rebecca Kelly Slaughter fired while simultaneously pretending they haven’t already made up their minds about whether presidents can ignore 90-year-old Supreme Court precedent. What makes this particularly brazen is that the Court is allowing Trump to violate […]
title: Supreme Court Uses Shadow Docket To Let Trump Fire FTC Commissioner While Pretending They Haven’t Already Decided The Case

author: Art Jipson and Paul J. Becker
description: After the Sept. 10, 2025, assassination of conservative political activist Charlie Kirk, President Donald Trump claimed that radical leftist groups foment political violence in the U.S., and “they should be put in jail.” “The radical left causes tremendous violence,” he said, asserting that “they seem to do it in a bigger way” than groups on the right. […]
title: Right Wing Extremist Violence Is More Frequent And More Deadly Than Left Wing Violence

author: Tim Cushing
description: The regime that controls the nation and constantly shoves it towards the next constitutional crisis is at it again. And by “it,” I mean complaining that people aren’t nicer to it. Yes, the deliberately antagonistic Trump administration can dish it out, but it definitely can’t take it. That has resulted in this latest bit of […]
title: DHS Demands Media, Politicians Stop Being So Mean To ICE

author: Daily Deal
description: Discover the future of AI with the ChatGPT and Gemini AI Advanced Course. Harness the power of cutting-edge tools like ChatGPT, Gemini AI, GPT 3.5, GPT 4, Bard, DALL-E 2, and more. Transform your creative process, boost productivity, and explore limitless possibilities in text, image, video, and audio generation. Dive into hands-on learning and real-world […]
title: Daily Deal: The 2025 Complete ChatGPT And Gemini AI Course

author: Mike Masnick
description: Look, if you want to cut to the chase: the lawyers working for Google and Meta know that the MAGA world is very, very stupid and very, very gullible, and it’s very, very easy to tell them something that they know will be interpreted as a “victory” while actually signaling something very, very different. You […]
title: Jim Jordan Celebrates Google Caving To His Pressure In Letter That Says Caving To Government Pressure Is Wrong

author: Karl Bode
description: The Secret Service says it has uncovered what it’s calling “a network of electronic devices located throughout the New York Tri-state area that were used to conduct multiple telecommunications-related threats directed towards senior U.S. government officials.” The news was announced, in part, over at the right wing propaganda website run by an overt white supremacist […]
title: Secret Service Dubiously Claims, Without Evidence, To Have Uncovered ‘Hidden Telecom Network’ That Could Have Crippled NYC, UN

author: Timothy Geigner
description: If we were to play a Techdirt word association game where you say the first thing that comes to your mind when I say “Nintendo,” the answer had better be “intellectual property bully” for most regular readers here. If not, well, I specifically haven’t done my job very well. Nintendo is incredibly protective and litigious […]
title: Hey, Nintendo: You Cool With ICE Using Your Pokémon IP To Recruit More Goons?
